```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
df =read_excel("Data/Master List.xlsx")
head(df)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, df(x="", y=Heroin)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1, color="white") +
  coord_polar("y", start=0) +
  
  theme_void() # remove background, grid, numeric labels
```
